titleStmt.title: A proclamation requiring all heretors and free-holders, under an hundred pounds Scots of valued yearly rent, to come presently out and attend the kings host.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Title vignette: Royal seal with initials I R.
Imperfect: Sheet creased, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
